text: 3:27 Esekiel 12:2-3; 24:27; 33:22Eghtɨ gɨn nɨ nan akam gumazamizibav kɨnsɨ ifongeghtɨ, kɨ nɨn mɨzem damightɨ, nɨ ua mɨkɨmam. Egh nɨ me mɨkɨm suam, ‘Kar Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam, ia mɨkɨmasa mɨkemezir akaba.’ Eghtɨ tarazi nɨ baraghsɨ ifuegham, a dera, me mar nɨ baragh. Eghtɨ tarazi oraghan aghuagham, markɨ, me mar aghuagh. E fo, me gumazamizir akaba batoziba.”
